Name: Jafar the Gentle
Desc: When Jafar the Gentle dies, destroy all creatures blocking or blocked by it. They can't Resist-Death.

Name: Sultan's Guard
Desc: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

Name: Sand Strider
Desc: (Any beings with formation, and up to one without, can strike in a formation. Formations are defended as a group. If any beings with formation you control are Defending or being defended by a being, you divide that being's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the beings it's being defended by or is Defending.) As long as Sand Strider is striking, prevent all damage Deserts would deal to Sand Strider and to beings formed with Sand Strider.

Name: Just Desert
Desc: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, instead that source deals that much damage to you and Just Desert deals that much damage to that source's controller.

Name: Holy Quest
Desc: As Holy Quest enters, choose a color and an opponent. White beings get +2/+1 as long as the chosen player controls a non-token permanent of the chosen color. When the chosen player controls no non-token permanents of the chosen color, sacrifice Holy Quest.

Name: Sultan Sufyan
Desc: [Channel]: Destroy target Djinn or Efreet.

Name: Desert Riders
Desc: FALSE

Name: Devotion
Desc: Defending beings get +0/+3 until end of turn.

Name: Forgiven Smith
Desc: Immune from red

Name: Narra Hazade
Desc: Players play a MoM subgame, using their remaining Deck. Each player who doesn't win the subgame loses half their health, rounded up.

Name: Battle Elephant
Desc: (Any beings with formation, and up to one without, can strike in a formation. Formations are defended as a group. If any beings with formation you control are Defending or being defended by a being, you divide that being's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the beings it's being defended by or is Defending.)

Name: Desert Serpent
Desc: Desert Serpent can't strike unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Desert Serpent.

Name: Sandfish Oil
Desc: (Target a being as you cast this. This card enters attached to that being.) Glyphed being has Island strider. (It can't be defended as long as defending player controls an Island.)

Name: Sky Wanderers
Desc: FALSE

Name: Colossal Carapace
Desc: Colossal Carapace gets +0/+3 as long as it's unchanneled.

Name: Oasis Leviathan
Desc: Oasis Leviathan doesn't unchannel during your Unchannel Phase. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay [3 Blue-Arcana]. If you do, unchannel Oasis Leviathan. Oasis Leviathan can't strike unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Oasis Leviathan.

Name: Trade Vessel
Desc: Trade Vessel can't strike unless defending player controls an Island. Whenever Trade Vessel strikes and isn't defended, you gain 2 Health. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Trade Vessel.

Name: Elder of the Waves
Desc: You may choose not to unchannel Elder of the Waves during your Unchannel Phase. [Channel]: Gain control of target being with power less than or equal to Elder of the Waves's power for as long as Elder of the Waves remains channeled and that being's power remains less than or equal to Elder of the Waves's power.

Name: Mirage Djinn
Desc: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a Domain. If you sacrifice an Island this way, Mirage Djinn deals 3 damage to you. When you control no Domains, sacrifice Mirage Djinn.

Name: Desert Efreet
Desc: At the beginning of your upkeep, Desert Efreet deals 1 damage to you.

Name: Sandbad the Sailor
Desc: [Channel]: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a Domain card, discard it.

Name: Chaotic Transformation
Desc: Glyphed being gets +3/+3. At the beginning of the upkeep of glyphed being's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that being.

Name: Desert Enchantress
Desc: [Channel]: Desert Enchantress deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to any target of an opponent's choice.

Name: Hajjir the Wise
Desc: Whenever Hajjir the Wise deals damage, you gain that much Health.

Name: Sand Dune Raiders
Desc: At the beginning of your End-Turn Phase, if Sand Dune Raiders didn't strike this turn, Sand Dune Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.

Name: Sentinel Creature
Desc: As long as Sentinel Creature is unchanneled, non-being Relics you control can't be glyphed, they have Invincibility, and other players can't gain control of them. This effect doesn't remove glyphs already attached to those Relics.

Name: Desert Ogress
Desc: Whenever Desert Ogress strikes, it deals 3 damage to you unless you pay [2 Any-Arcana].

Name: Tempest Efreet
Desc: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Tempest Efreet unless you pay [2 Black-Arcana].

Name: Abyssal Djinn
Desc: At the beginning of your upkeep, Abyssal Djinn deals 1 damage to you.

Name: Dune Ghoul
Desc: At the beginning of each End-Turn Phase, put a +1/+1 counter on Dune Ghoul for each being that died this turn.

Name: Forgotten Pit
Desc: When Forgotten Pit enters, target being fades out until Forgotten Pit leaves the field. Channel that being as it fades in this way. (Glyphs and Equipment fade out with it. While permanents are faded out, they're treated as though they don't exist.)

Name: Enchantress Sovereign
Desc: [Channel]: Target being other than Enchantress Sovereign has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.

Name: Rock Slingers
Desc: First strike

Name: Adilan
Desc: [1 Any-Arcana][2 Red-Arcana], [Channel]: Gain control of target Relic for as long as you control Adilan.

Name: Baba Ali
Desc: [1 Red-Arcana]: Channel target Wall.

Name: Ali of Mirage
Desc: Damage that would reduce your Health total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

Name: Avian Damsel
Desc: FALSE

Name: Wandering Tribes
Desc: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wandering Tribes by Deserts.

Name: Desert Jackal
Desc: [Channel]: Target being can't be reinvigorated this turn.

Name: Sand Ape
Desc: Sand Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

Name: Ironpeak
Desc: Blue beings don't unchannel during their controllers' Unchannel Phases. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of channeled blue beings they control and pay [4 Any-Arcana] for each being chosen this way. If the player does, unchannel those beings.

Name: Mirage Djinn
Desc: Whenever Mirage Djinn strikes, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, remove Mirage Djinn from combat and channel it.

Name: Roc Egg
Desc: When Roc Egg dies, create a 4/4 red Bird being token with flying at the beginning of the next End-Turn Phase.

Name: Wydan Efreet
Desc: Whenever Wydan Efreet Defends, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, remove Wydan Efreet from combat and it can't Defend this turn. Beings it was Defending that had become defended by only Wydan Efreet this combat become Undefended.

Name: Desert Whirlwind
Desc: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a wind counter on Desert Whirlwind, then sacrifice Desert Whirlwind unless you pay [Green-Arcana] for each wind counter on it. If you pay, Desert Whirlwind deals damage equal to the number of wind counters on it to each being and each player.

Name: Sandstorm Twister
Desc: Destroy target permanent.

Name: Nectar of the Oasis
Desc: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy the being with the least power. It can't be reinvigorated. If two or more beings are tied for least power, you choose one of them. When there are no beings on the field, sacrifice Nectar of the Oasis.

Name: Erhnam Spirit
Desc: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall being an opponent controls gains Forest-Dweller until your next upkeep. (It can't be defended as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

Name: Ghazban Giant
Desc: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than each other player, the player with the most life gains control of Ghazban Giant.

Name: Inferno Efreet
Desc: [Green-Arcana]: Inferno Efreet deals 1 damage to each being with flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.

Name: Transfiguration
Desc: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a being. Add X arcana of any one color, where X is 1 plus the sacrificed being's arcana value. Spend this arcana only to cast being spells.

Name: Desert Asp
Desc: Whenever Desert Asp deals damage to a player, that player loses 1 Health at the beginning of their next Draw Phase unless they pay [1 Any-Arcana] before that Draw Phase.

Name: Sand Tempest
Desc: Sand Tempest deals 1 damage to each Striking Being.

Name: Melodious Tree
Desc: [Channel]: Target Striking Being has base power 0 until end of turn.

Name: Desert Wolf
Desc: [Channel]: Target being gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Name: Adilan's Lantern
Desc: {X}, [Channel]: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead look at the top X cards of your Deck, put all but one of them on the bottom of your Deck in a random order, then draw a card. X can't be 0.

Name: Adilan's Band
Desc: [8 Any-Arcana], [Channel]: Adilan's Band deals 4 damage to any target.

Name: Flask of Sufyan
Desc: [1 Any-Arcana], Sacrifice Flask of Sufyan: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, create a 5/5 colorless Djinn Relic being token with flying. If you lose the flip, Flask of Sufyan deals 5 damage to you.

Name: Bronze Golem
Desc: Bronze Golem doesn't unchannel during your Unchannel Phase. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay [1 Any-Arcana]. If you do, unchannel Bronze Golem.

Name: Captured City
Desc: Whenever one or more other non-token permanents with a name originally printed in the Arabian Nights expansion are on the field, their controllers sacrifice them. Players can't cast spells or play domains with a name originally printed in the Arabian Nights expansion.

Name: Whirling Sword
Desc: (This being can't be defended except by beings with flying or reach.)

Name: Midnight Steed
Desc: [2 Any-Arcana], [Channel]: Unchannel target Striking Being you control. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that being this turn.

Name: Soaring Rug
Desc: [2 Any-Arcana], [Channel]: Target being gains flying until end of turn.

Name: Jandor's Circle
Desc: [2 Any-Arcana], [Channel], Discard the last card you drew this turn: Draw a card.

Name: Jandor's Packs
Desc: [3 Any-Arcana], [Channel]: Unchannel target being.

Name: Gemmed Avian
Desc: Remove Gemmed Avian from your Deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. [Channel]: Ante Gemmed Avian. If you do, put all other cards you own from the ante into your discard-pile, then draw a card.

Name: Sand Monoliths
Desc: [2 Any-Arcana]: Choose one: Destroy target Glyph attached to a Domain. OR The next time target Domain would be destroyed this turn, remove all damage marked on it instead.

Name: Ring of Miran
Desc: [5 Any-Arcana], [Channel], Exile Ring of Miran: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead put a card you own from outside the game into your hand.

Name: Sandals of Adnan
Desc: [2 Any-Arcana], [Channel]: Target being gains Island-Dweller until end of turn. When that being dies this turn, destroy Sandals of Adnan. (A being with Island-Dweller can't be defended as long as defending player controls an Island.)

Name: Market of Mirage
Desc: [Channel]: Draw two cards, then discard three cards.

Name: City of Bronze
Desc: Whenever City of Bronze becomes channeled, it deals 1 damage to you. [Channel]: Add one arcana of any color.

Name: The Wastes
Desc: [Channel]: Add [Any-Arcana]. [Channel]: The Wastes deals 1 damage to target Striking Being. Activate only during the End-Turn Phase.

Name: Gemstone Valley
Desc: [Channel], Sacrifice a Being - You gain Health equal to the sacrificed being's toughness.

Name: Elephant Graveyard
Desc: [Channel]: Add [Any-Arcana]. [Channel]: Target Elephant can Resist-Death.

Name: Oasis of Waku
Desc: [Channel]: Target being with flying has base power 0 until end of turn.

Name: Library of Sufyan
Desc: [Channel]: Add [Any-Arcana]. [Channel]: Draw a card. Activate only if you have exactly seven cards in hand.

Name: Desert Spring
Desc: [Channel]: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target being this turn.

Name: Swamp
Desc: [Channel]: Add [1 Black-Arcana].

Name: Island
Desc: [Channel]: Add [1 Blue-Arcana].

Name: Forest
Desc: [Channel]: Add [1 Green-Arcana].

Name: Mountain
Desc: [Channel]: Add [1 Red-Arcana].

Name: Plains
Desc: [Channel]: Add [1 White-Arcana].
